>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/interactions/{interactionGuid}/topics"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the list of detected topics within the transcriptions

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"interactionGuid","in":"path","description":"The interaction unique identifier","required":true,"style":"simple","explode":false,"schema":{"type":"string","example":"int-15bd0b19d21-KK2fSQPPTD3DRpOS8UfhmgALh-phone-03-sample"}},{"name":"Content-Type","in":"header","required":true,"style":"simple","explode":false,"schema":{"type":"string","example":"application/json"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"description":"The object model for a topic definition","title":"Speech Analytics Topic","type":"object","properties":{"channel":{"type":"string","example":"0"},"topic":{"type":"string","example":"Agent Sales Enablers"},"category":{"type":"string","example":"Sales"}},"example":{"channel":0,"topic":"Agent Sales Enablers","category":"Sales"}}},"example":[{"channel":0,"topic":"Agent Sales Enablers","category":"Sales"}]}}},"default":{"description":"Unexpected error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
